title: Number of lobbyists in the U.S. 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Number of lobbyists has rose over the Year.
Number of lobbyists is roughly constant from 2003 to 2004, and lastly slightly increasing from 2004 to 2005.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2004 and 2005.
Maximum Number of lobbyists, about 14093.0 was reported at Year 2005
Minimum Number of lobbyists about 12960.0 was reached at Year 2003
min_summary: Overall Number of lobbyists has increased over the Year.
Number of lobbyists is roughly constant from 2003 to 2004, and lastly slightly increasing from 2004 to 2005.
